DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass compare efficacy morbidity standard percutaneous nephrolithotomy tubeless PNL . A total approximately 60 patient enrol . Patients randomize one four group : standard percutaneous nephrostomy , double-J ureteral stent , open-ended ureteral catheter nephrostomy ureteral stent/catheter . Primary Outcome Measures include length procedure estimate blood loss . Post-operative analgesic use ( parenteral oral ) , pain score , time ambulation , time oral intake , pain score also record . Time nephrostomy tube removal , external ureteral Foley catheter removal patient discharge hospital also record . Incidence type post-operative complication also record .
DOC.brief_title: Standard Percutaneous Nephrolithotomy Percutaneous Nephrolithotomy ( PNL ) Versus Tubeless PNL Versus Tubeless Stentless PNL
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old Planned single tract percutaneous nephrolithotomy General anesthesia percutaneous nephrolithotomy Age < 18 year old Known residual calculus end procedure Significant hemorrhage procedure Bleeding disorder ( This include patient take anticoagulant stop prior surgery . ) Prisoners Inability give inform consent Pregnant females Solitary kidney Transplant kidney Pleural effusion procedure require drainage Perforation renal collect system procedure Incomplete stone clearance Chronic pain syndrome
